copy.header: Need Help? You've come to the right place!
copy.body1:
FAQs - Frequently Asked Questions about the world of
Pixie Hollow
copy.body2: This is where you can find answers to your fellow Fairies' most Frequently Asked Questions. It's a good idea to visit this page before you send us your question.
copy.membershipfaq_header: Membership FAQs - Frequently Asked Questions about Membership
copy.membershipfaq_content: Look here for answers about becoming a Member in Pixie Hollow.
copy.body4: Didn't see your question in the FAQs? Then it's time to log in to Live Chat and get that answer!
copy.body6: If you think you have found a problem with the world of Pixie Hollow, please check this list of release notes/known issues before reporting a bug or sending an email.
copy.body8: Pixie Hollow has a variety of account settings to keep your child safe, including various chat options. Find out how to use them here.
copy.body10: Now and then a Fairy might try to disturb others. Report any non-Fairy-friendly behavior in the game here.
copy.body12: Manage chat permissions and account settings.
copy.body14: Review the Pixie Hollow Code of Conduct and the various chat options available in Pixie Hollow.
copy.body16: Download hints and tips for playing Pixie Hollow.
copy.body18:
If you think you've found a problem with the world of Pixie Hollow, please check our Known Issues before reporting your problem. Another Fairy may have already reported that same problem, which means our team is already working on fixing it!

If you have a question, you can try our FAQs page for the answer. If you do not find information on the problem you are having you can Report a Problem using our online form or call 877-78-PIXIE.
copy.body20: Create a new Disney.com account here to start playing Pixie Hollow.
